and.attribute: Toshiba Asia Pacific Pte., Ltd. (TAPL) is the regional centre of Toshiba group companies in Southeast Asia and Oceania. TAPL's ultimate goal is to provide value-added support for the group companies' business activities and hence enhance customer satisfaction. The main functions of TAPL are as follows: Business Planning / Administrative support for group companies PR and Advertising Social and Environmental Activities International procurement International logistics Marketing and Sales for Power Plant Business Marketing and Sales for Industrial Systems Business Marketing and Sales for Social Infrastructure Systems Business View more More jobs from this employer
